peril.views.slick

Interface Container

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChallengeMenu, CoreGameState, Credits, EndState, HelpMenu, Instructions, InteractiveState, LoadingScreen, MainMenu, Menu, Opening, PauseMenu, PlayerSelection, SlickAttack, SlickFortify, SlickReinforce, SlickSetup, StatsMenu, UpgradeMenu, WarMenu

    public interface Container
    Defines the behaviours of a object that can contain Buttons and Viewables. Buttons can be retrieved using getButton(String).
    Since:
    2018-02-16
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Viewable, Button

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addButton(Button button)
      Adds a Button to this Container.
      void addImage(Viewable image)
      Adds a Viewable to this Container.
      Button getButton(java.lang.String id)
      Retrieves a Button by its id.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Retrieves a uniquely identifying string that denotes this Container.

    • Method Detail

      • addButton

        void addButton(Button button)
        Adds a Button to this Container.
        Parameters:
        button - The Button to be added.

      • addImage

        void addImage(Viewable image)
        Adds a Viewable to this Container.
        Parameters:
        image - The Viewable to be added.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Retrieves a uniquely identifying string that denotes this Container.
        Returns:
        The name of this Container.

      • getButton

        Button getButton(java.lang.String id)
        Retrieves a Button by its id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of a Button in this Container.
        Returns:
        The Button assigned to the specified id.
